main event: Multiple residents of Sidney, Ohio reported seeing a 'flying saucer' on multiple dates in May 1949, described as a bright, cylindrical or disc-shaped object traveling at high speeds and emitting brilliant light before fading out of sight.
interesting points: Multiple residents observed the object traveling through space at a fast rate of speed on 3, 4, and 6 May 1949.
One witness reported seeing the object as he opened his jewelry store, describing it as cylindrical in shape and traveling at a high rate of speed from northwest to southeast.
Another witness observed the object as oblong in shape, about the size of a football, and traveling in a straight line.
The object emitted a brilliant red and orange light, and witnesses reported that it made no sound or left any trail.
One witness reported that the object left a purplish colored trail behind and appeared to emit a very brilliant light, but made no noise.
sighted object: bright, cylindrical or disc-shaped object emitting brilliant light
